quotes.quote: That's what university life is all about. Challenging, questioning, enjoying good people and good friends, and pushing yourself to the limit.
A man who has never gone to school may steal from a freight car; but if he has a university education, he may steal the whole railroad.
The University brings out all abilities, including incapability.
A truly great university is a nucleus of artistic expression. It fosters creative, critical thought, and serves as a platform for civil discourse.
The task of a university is the creation of the future, so far as rational thought and civilized modes of appreciation can affect the issue.
The medieval university looked backwards; it professed to be a storehouse of old knowledge. The modern university looks forward, and is a factory of new knowledge.
The most important function of the university in an age of reason is to protect reason from itself.
It is the goal of the American university to be the brains of the republic.
The purpose of the university is to make students safe for ideas - not ideas safe for students.
The university is our culture's assertion that what is made by the mind has value and can convey values.
University's like this little world, a bubble of time separate from everything before and everything after.
The privilege of a university education is a great one; the more widely it is extended the better for any country.
A university is what a college becomes when the faculty loses interest in the students.
The use of a university is to make young gentlemen as unlike their fathers as possible.
It is not the task of the University to offer what society asks for, but to give what society needs.
The university is a series of individual entrepreneurs held together by a common grievance about parking.
A university educates the intellect to reason well in all matters, to reach out towards truth, and to grasp it.
The University conceives of itself as dedicated to the power of the intellect. Its commitment is to the way of reason.
A University should be a place of light, of liberty, and of learning.
The true university of these days is a collection of books.
A university is not a political party, and an education is not an indoctrination.
A university is supposed to be a place where all ideas are discussed.
When students get into a great university, it's a huge aspirational lift for their village. These students become beacons of hope.
In the modern university, no act of good teaching goes unpunished.
The best university is the university of life.
He who enters a university walks on hallowed ground.
The university is the last remaining platform for national dissent.
A university is just a group of buildings gathered around a library. The library is the university.
The university has become a place that prepares you for the fights in the world.
University is the best couple of years of your life. Nowhere else can you drink and chase as many birds.
